title: Help me pick a game?
body:
Not too hard a question. Just looking for a game to play when I burn out on League. I bought Fallout a week ago and love it, but I don't want to finish it too quickly. Been looking at Syndicate, Star Wars, ARK and Call of Duty -- any of them any good?

I also enjoy platformers and RPGs (bought Ori and loved it, but it only lasted me about 9 hours, even though I finished it 100%), so those are always welcome suggestions.

I dunno, figured I'd ask people who play these games what they think. :P Thanks for any help. ^^
